Reference

All functions

ISADataFrame()

Helper function to obtain ISADataFrame object.

add_metadata()

Adds new metadata to the metadata attribute.

anti_join(<ISADataFrame>)

anti_join implementation for ISADataFrame.

date_columns_coll()

Possible choices for date_col parameter.

date_formats()

Possible choices for the dates_format parameter in import_association_file, import_parallel_vispa2Matrices_interactive and import_parallel_vispa2Matrices_auto.

.all_match()

Helper function for checking if all of the elements of the list is true.

.any_match()

Helper function for checking if any of the elements of the list is true.

.auto_detect_type()

Internal function to auto-detect the type of IS based on the headers.

.check_af_correctness()

Checks if the association file has the right format (standard headers).

.check_atLeastOneExp()

Internal helper function for checking presence of experimental data columns.

.check_file_system_alignment()

Internal function to check alignment between association file and file system starting from the root. The alignment is checked at folder level.

.check_metadata()

Internal helper function for checking metadata fields.

.check_nonNumdata()

Internal helper function for checking presence of experimental data columns and verifying they're numeric.

.check_same_info()

Checks if association file contains more information than the matrix.

.checker_widget()

Builds the html widget for the checker table.

.choose_duplicates_files_interactive()

Simple function to manage user input for duplicate file choices for each quantification type in a single project/pool pair (use internally in .manage_anomalies_interactive).

.coll_mapping()

Internal function to process collisions on multiple integrations.

.discriminate_by_date()

Internal for date discrimination in collision removal.

.discriminate_by_replicate()

Internal for replicate discrimination in collision removal.

.discriminate_by_seqCount()

Internal for sequence count discrimination in collision removal.

.files_found_widget()

Builds the html widget for the files_found table.

.files_imported_widget()

Builds the html widget for the files_imported table.

.files_to_import_widget()

Builds the html widget for the files_to_import table.

.find_nonNumData()

Internal helper function to find the indexes of detected non numeric columns.

.fix_metadata()

Internal utility function to use for fixing the metadata attribute after structural changes to an ISADataFrame object.

.four_step_check()

Internal function that performs four-step-check of collisions for a single integration.

.identify_independent_samples()

Identifies independent samples and separates the joined_df in collisions and non-collisions

.import_type()

Internal function for parallel import of a single quantification type files.

.interactive_select_pools_import()

Allows the user to choose interactively the pools to consider for import.

.interactive_select_projects_import()

Allows the user to choose interactively the projects to consider for import.

.join_matrix_af()

Produces a joined tibble between the sequence count matrix and the association file

.lookup_matrices()

Looks up matrices to import given the association file and the root of the file system.

.lookup_matrices_auto()

Looks up matrices to import given the association file and the root of the file system.

.manage_anomalies_auto()

Manages anomalies for files found.

.manage_anomalies_interactive()

Manages anomalies for files found.

.manage_association_file()

Helper function to be used when importing matrices in parallel.

.messy_to_tidy()

Internal function to convert a messy matrix to a tidy data frame

.obtain_nested()

Returns a polished version of collisions table for analysis.

.parallel_import_merge()

Internal function for importing all files for each quantification type.

.pattern_matching()

Internal function to match user defined patterns on a vector of file names.

.pool_choices_IN()

Simple helper interal function to handle user input for actual pool choices.

.pool_number_IN()

Simple internal helper function to handle user input for selection of number of pools.

.process_collisions()

Internal function to process collisions on multiple integrations, parallelized.

.read_and_correctness_af()

Reads association file and checks if it's correct or not.

.summary_collisions_widget()

Builds the html widget for the summary table.

.summary_table()

Internal function to obtain a summary table after collision processing.

.trace_anomalies()

Updates a files_found tibble with Files_count and Anomalies column.

.update_af_after_alignment()

Updates the association file after the alignment check.

.update_as_option()

Updates files_found tibble according to pattern and matching options.

generate_Vispa2_launch_AF()

Creates a reduced association file for Vispa2 run, given project and pool

generate_blank_association_file()

Creates a blank association file.

import_association_file()

Import the association file from disk

import_parallel_Vispa2Matrices_interactive() import_parallel_Vispa2Matrices_auto()

Import integration matrices based on the association file.

import_single_Vispa2Matrix()

Import a single integration matrix from file

inner_join(<ISADataFrame>)

inner_join implementation for ISADataFrame.

is.ISADataFrame()

Is the object an ISADataFrame?

left_join(<ISADataFrame>)

left_join implementation for ISADataFrame.

mandatoryVars()

Gets the value of the attribute mandatoryVars.

matching_options()

Possible choices for the matching_opt parameter.

metadata()

Gets the value of the attribute metadata.

new_ISADataFrame()

Low-level efficient constructor for ISADataFrame objects.

pivot_longer(<ISADataFrame>)

Pivot_longer implementation for ISADataFrame.

print(<ISADataFrame>)

Printing ISADataFrames

quantification_types()

Possible choices for the quantification_type parameter.

realign_after_collisions()

Re-aligns matrices of other quantification types based on the processed sequence count matrix.

remove_collisions()

Identifies and removes collisions based on the sequence count matrix.

remove_metadata()

Removes metadata from the metadata attribute.

select(<ISADataFrame>)

select implementation for ISADataFrame.

semi_join(<ISADataFrame>)

semi_join implementation for ISADataFrame.

unzip_file_system()

A utility function to unzip and use example file systems included in the package

validate_ISADataFrame()

Validator for ISADataFrame objects.

vec_restore.ISADataFrame()

Implementation of vec_restore for ISADataFrame.
